name: A Woodsman
description: A Woodsman is a minimalist exploration game. There is no specific end goal other than to uncover the world. The focus is on the sense of 'what is over that next hill, where does the river go, what does this symbol mean'. As such, you can slowly fill out the map, share what you find with villages and acquire tools to help you explore further, and decipher the alphabets of different cultures.
